LanguageData.XFMParmor_Root.label: machine'o'war
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Root.description: The concepts and technological fundation of mechframes.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchArmor.label: mech armor component
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchArmor.description: Unlocks the mechframe armor component, the part that forms the chassis.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchShield.label: mech shield component
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchShield.description: Unlocks the mechframe shield generator, a device that projects a protective force field around the mechframe.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchWeapon.label: mech weaponry component
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchWeapon.description: Unlocks the mechframe weaponry component, assorted systems that bestows mechframe aggresive capabilities.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchControl.label: mech control component
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchControl.description: Unlocks the mechframe control component, the bridge between pilot and the machine.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Prototype.label: prototype: Crow
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Prototype.description: Unlocks the prototypical mechframe: the crow. This general purpose mechframe is armed with a heavy machinegun, and having the ability of: rocket barrage, shield barrier and shock blast.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchRed.label: melee specialist: falcon
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchRed.description: Unlocks the melee combat oriented mechframe: the falcon. This agile mechframe come equiped with a pair of plasma dual blades, and capable of: charged assault and active reflection.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchAqua.label: damage specialist: owl
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchAqua.description: Unlocks the damage potential optimized mechframe: the owl. This offensive mechframe carries a versatile compound lance with switchable modes, while supplemented by a skill set of: arctic gale and frozen flood
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchCarrier.label: support specialist: sparrow
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ResearchCarrier.description: Unlocks the supporter mechframe: the sparrow. This versatile mechframe comes with a light machinegun and a drone fabricator, centered around the command of: defensive order, offensive order.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ModulesSystem.label: modular upgrades
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ModulesSystem.description: Enables the mechframes to be modified with modular upgrades.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ModuleLargeBattery.label: heavy duty battery
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ModuleLargeBattery.description: Triples the power capacity of mechframes with heavy duty battery upgrade.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ModuleSupply.label: field supply module
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ModuleSupply.description: Satisfies pilot's food and bed needs in action with field supply module.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ModuleSolarPower.label: solar panel module
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ModuleSolarPower.description: Deploys a solar panel and recharges battery when inactive with solar pannel module.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ModuleComfortAndJoy.label: combat recreation module
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ModuleComfortAndJoy.descriptio: Provide a better piloting experience with the combat recreation module.
